entries: Your relic shines with holy light. This creates bright light in a 30-foot emanation around the item. {@trait Evil} creatures in the area are {@condition frightened 1}, and can't lower their {@condition frightened} value below 1 as long as they remain in the light. {@trait fiend||Fiends} in the area increase any weakness to good damage they have by 5. You can {@action sustain an activation||Sustain this Activation} for up to 1 minute.
